copy.teleportFail: You can't get there right now. Try again later.
copy.teleportToHomeFail: Sorry, that home is full right now. Try again later.
copy.teleportToFairyFail: You can't fly to that player right now. Try again later.
copy.teleportToFairyInHomeFail: Sorry, this player is in a full home right now. Try flying to them again later.
copy.teleportToBootedFairyHomeFail: This #GENDER#'s home and garden are not available right now.
copy.teleportToFairyCraftingFail: Sorry, this player is busy Tailoring right now. Try flying to them later.
copy.teleportToFairyCraftingFail100002: Sorry, this player is busy Baking right now. Try flying to them later.
copy.teleportToFairyCraftingFail100003: Sorry, this player is busy Tinkering right now. Try flying to them later.
copy.teleportToFairyGameFail: Sorry, this player is playing a game right now. Try flying to them later.
copy.teleportToFairyQuietZoneFail: Sorry, this player is busy right now. Try flying to them later.
copy.onBootedFromZone: This fairy's home and garden are not available right now.
copy.loginError: Your log-in information wasn't recognized - please try logging in again.
copy.loginDuplicate: One of your other Fairies is entering Pixie Hollow. Please exit the game!
copy.DCServerLogin: Flying to the Pixie Dust Tree...
copy.DCConnectFail: Oops...there was a problem flying you into the world. Please try logging in again.
copy.securityError: Oops...there was a problem entering Pixie Hollow. Please try logging in again.
copy.socketClose: Oops...there was a problem reaching Pixie Hollow. Please try logging in again.
copy.IOError: Oops...there was a problem in Pixie Hollow. Please try logging in again.
copy.gameConnectionLost: Oops...there was a problem with your connection to the game. Please try logging in again.
copy.goneIdleAndKicked: Your Fairy or Sparrow Man has been idle for more than #TIME# minutes. Please fly in again!
copy.banned: There has been a reported violation of our Terms of Use connected to this account. For safety purposes, we have placed a temporary hold on the account. For more details, please review the messages sent to the e-mail address associated with this account.
copy.suggestMinSpec: It looks like Pixie Hollow is running slowly on your computer. Would you like to switch to Basic Mode to speed things up?
copy.minSpecConfirm: You have now switched to Basic Mode! You can change back to Normal Mode at any time from the Options tab in your Leaf Journal.
copy.noSpells1: Sorry, you can't enter the Wilderness yet. Visit Fawn, your animal-talent Mentor Fairy, to unlock your Talent Skills!
copy.noSpells2: Sorry, you can't enter the Wilderness yet. Visit Rosetta, your garden-talent Mentor Fairy, to unlock your Talent Skills!
copy.noSpells3: Sorry, you can't enter the Wilderness yet. Visit Iridessa, your light-talent Mentor Fairy, to unlock your Talent Skills!
copy.noSpells4: Sorry, you can't enter the Wilderness yet. Visit Silvermist, your water-talent Mentor Fairy, to unlock your Talent Skills!
copy.noSpells5: Sorry, you can't enter the Wilderness yet. Visit Tinker Bell, your tinker-talent Mentor Fairy, to unlock your Talent Skills!
copy.differentTermsCopy: By clicking this ad you are leaving the Pixie Hollow website, where different terms of use and privacy policy will apply.
copy.leaderboardGifts: You really know your way around Talent Games! Here's a Mega Trophy to prove it!
copy.ballroomClosedMembers: The Ballroom is closed right now, but will exclusively open for all Members during select Pixie Hollow Events.
copy.lizziesGatewayBadge: Lizzy's Fairy Home is locked! Visit Tinker Bell and complete her new quest to get the key.
copy.coliseumGatewayBadge: The Fairy Coliseum is locked! Visit Marina and complete her new quest to get the key.
copy.iceCastleGatewayBadge: The Ice Palace is locked! Visit Silvermist to help with winter and get the key!
copy.frostedForestGatewayBadge: You need the Chilly Traveler Badge to fly into Frosted Forest! Visit Tink to help with the animal crossing and get the badge!
copy.spikesGatewayBadge: You need the Chilly Traveler Badge to fly into Spike's Sweet Shop! Visit Tink to help with the animal crossing and get the badge!
copy.troopRabbitGatewayItem: You need to be wearing a Troop Rabbit top to enter. Visit Cassie's in Havendish Square.
copy.troopButterflyGatewayItem: You need to be wearing a Troop Butterfly top to enter. Visit Cassie's in Havendish Square.
copy.troopOtterGatewayItem: You need to be wearing a Troop Otter top to enter. Visit Cassie's in Havendish Square.
copy.troopTurtleGatewayItem: You need to be wearing a Troop Turtle top to enter. Visit Cassie's in Havendish Square.
copy.troopGlowwormGatewayItem: You need to be wearing a Troop Glowworm top to enter. Visit Cassie's in Havendish Square.
copy.mermaidGatewayBadge: You can't go to Mermaid Grotto without the key! Visit Silvermist and complete her new quest to get in.
copy.AFFoodBowl: You need to have a #ANIMAL# following you to use this feeding bowl!#NL##NL#Click GO to get one from Beck's Animal Nursery now.
copy.AFFoodBowlFull: Oops! These treats sure look tasty, but your #ANIMAL# is full.
copy.invalidCraftError: Sorry, it looks like you can't make that now.
copy.inventoryFullWarning: Sorry, you need to make some room in your inventory before you can get that.
copy.partyInvite: #NAME# has invited you to their party!
copy.quest_response_1: Sorry, this quest is not available right now.
copy.quest_response_2: Sorry, this quest is only for Members.
copy.quest_response_3: Sorry, there is a problem with this quest
copy.quest_response_4: Sorry, this quest can only be completed by Members.
copy.quest_response_5: Sorry, there seems to be a problem with this quest step.
copy.quest_response_6: Sorry, you can't turn in this quest here!
copy.quest_response_7: Sorry, you can't turn in this quest yet!
